channel.title: [317]How to make new rights, adminrights
channel.description:
ive been looking for hours and i can't find anything that helps me. What i really need is a step by step tutorial on how.
What i want to do is creat a new rights system, like playerrights, but called adminrights.
Please do not flame this topic with how stupid i am, i get enough of that browsing the forums, i am an absolute beginner and do not know much about private servers.
Help Please! :confused:
